articles.title: Essex coronavirus: Covid-19 cases exceed 2,700 across the county - Essex Live
articles.description: Nationwide, more than 20,000 people have now passed away after testing positive for Covid-19
articles.content:
The total number of coronavirus cases in Essex has risen to over 2,700, according to Public Health England data released today (April 25)
Nationwide, 148,377 people who have now tested positive for the Covid-19 virus, and the death toll stands at  20,319.
